answers.answer: I would say no cuz why would they have you drink it if it would harm the baby , ya kno ?
Yes true I'm just worried that If I do have it I'm not suppose to eat/drink sugar like that cause my blood isn't using it right! Just being paranoid mama I guess!
You should be fine...i know what u mean i had the same concerns but thata not that nad compared to u eating chocolate and sugar all the time...
No its no problem that wont cause u diabeties lol but it ***** taking it again!! I votmitted on my second nd i was almost finish but she said it was ok nd i pass the test came out good thank god!!!

The nurse shouldnt of took your blood before hand. I went to one of those labs places and they gave me the drink made me wait and than they took the blood. Make sure that was correct. The first time seems like you did it right.

Yes, keaij they are supposed to take your blood before you drink at the 3 hr test as this is called the fasting blood sugar level which is an important factor in determining gestational diabetes...and no worries cedesmarie  you'll be fine. No harm done, I have gestational diabetes and had one high reading in all the weeks I've been testing my sugar and the doctor explained to me that once here and there is not a problem. It becomes dangerous when your sugar is constantly too high because the baby's body is now trying to pump put enough insulin meet the levels in your body and when they are born their bodies continue to produce too much insulin causing them to have low blood sugar.. There are also other problems that can occur for baby and mom but again no worries you'll be fine

question: I went back to the lab today to take my 3 hr glucose test bc I failed my first one.. I drank the glucose drink and a hour later the lady tells me she forgot to draw my blood before I drank it and I'll have to come back!! If I was to have gestational diabetes, Could anything bad happen since I drank that much sugar ??
title: The lab messed up my 3 HR glucose test.. Could this hurt my baby???
